[i]Origin[/i] – As Kris, First Avatar enters, choose a creature type and up to two different colors. Kris is that creature type and those colors in addition to his other types and colors.
[i]Sword of Shadow[/i] – Whenever Kris attacks, put an ability counter of your choice of a keyword Kris has onto another target creature you control.
Partner with Marth, First King [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Marth into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
